channel.title: Almost done with my source just a few more questions.[317]
channel.description:
NOTE: I will rep every person that helps one of my questions.
[s]1.) How do i change a teleports name from its original teleport fore example Level 25: Varrock To Home.[/s] 2.)How to add a donor points system with a donor shop. 3.)How to change rewards in pest control and how many points it gives you. 4.)How to add duel arena (Linking me to a tutorial would be fine)
Adding more.

item.title: Almost done with my source just a few more questions.[317]
item.dc:creator: @lildude783 lildude783
item.description:
@lildude783 wrote:

well… 1st one… u already did…

2nd one… add a playerRights = -1 … -1 being lower than a member… but exclusive and being a member/donator…

then add a shop that requires you to have a char right of == 1 and >= 1… that way non staff and non donors are unable to use it…

3rd one… i’d go into your file with the pest control things… and then change the rewards! or just go into mostclicks.java? and search around for the current rewards… and change them

4th one… dont know? aint perfected this myself?

if i didnt help soz
